scripts.start: npm run build && docker run -p 3000:3000 -p 9229:9229 -e PROTOCAL=https -e GRAPHHOPPER_SERVICE_NAME=api.bikehopper -e PHOTON_SERVICE_NAME=api.bikehopper -e NOMINATIM_SERVICE_NAME=api.bikehopper -e NAMESPACE=staging -e HOSTNAME=techlabor.org/v1 -e PORT=3000 --rm -it bikehopper-app:dev
